mn32:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā gosiṅgasālavanadāye viharati sambahulehi abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṁ—
mn32:1.3_0: āyasmatā ca sāriputtena āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānena āyasmatā ca mahākassapena āyasmatā ca anuruddhena āyasmatā ca revatena āyasmatā ca ānandena,
mn32:1.3_1: aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṁ.
mn32:2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami;
mn32:2.3_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosi.
mn32:2.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno āyasmā ca mahākassapo āyasmā ca anuruddho yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṁsu dhammassavanāya.
mn32:3.1_0: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ āyasmantañca mahākassapaṁ āyasmantañca anuruddhaṁ
mn32:3.2_0: Disvāna yenāyasmā revato tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ revataṁ etadavoca:
mn32:3.3_0: “upasaṅkamantā kho amū, āvuso revata, sappurisā yenāyasmā sāriputto tena dhammassavanāya.
mn32:3.4_0: Āyāmāvuso revata, yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamissāma dhammassavanāyā”ti.
mn32:3.5_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā revato āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.
mn32:3.6_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca revato āyasmā ca ānando yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṁsu dhammassavanāya.
mn32:4.1_0: Addasā kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantañca revataṁ āyasmantañca ānandaṁ dūratova āgacchante.
mn32:4.4_0: Svāgataṁ āyasmato ānandassa bhagavato upaṭṭhākassa bhagavato santikāvacarassa.
mn32:4.6_0: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso ānanda, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti?
mn32:4.7_2: Ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthā sabyañjanā;
mn32:4.8_0: So catassannaṁ parisānaṁ dhammaṁ deseti parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi anuppabandhehi anusayasamugghātāya.
mn32:4.9_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
mn32:5.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ revataṁ etadavoca:
mn32:5.2_0: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso revata, āyasmatā ānandena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
mn32:5.3_0: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ revataṁ pucchāma:
mn32:5.5_0: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso revata, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti?
mn32:5.7_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
mn32:6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca:
mn32:6.2_0: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso anuruddha, āyasmatā revatena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
mn32:6.3_0: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ pucchāma:
mn32:6.5_0: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso anuruddha, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti?
mn32:6.6_1: bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṁ lokānaṁ voloketi.
mn32:6.7_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhumā puriso uparipāsādavaragato sahassaṁ nemimaṇḍalānaṁ volokeyya;
mn32:6.8_2: bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṁ lokānaṁ voloketi.
mn32:6.9_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
mn32:7.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ etadavoca:
mn32:7.2_0: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso kassapa, āyasmatā anuruddhena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
mn32:7.3_0: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ pucchāma:
mn32:7.5_0: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso kassapa, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti?
mn32:7.6_1: bhikkhu attanā ca āraññiko hoti āraññikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_2: attanā ca piṇḍapātiko hoti piṇḍapātikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_3: attanā ca paṁsukūliko hoti paṁsukūlikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_4: attanā ca tecīvariko hoti tecīvarikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_5: attanā ca appiccho hoti appicchatāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_6: attanā ca santuṭṭho hoti santuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_7: attanā ca pavivitto hoti pavivekassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_8: attanā ca asaṁsaṭṭho hoti asaṁsaggassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_9: attanā ca āraddhavīriyo hoti vīriyārambhassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_10: attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti sīlasampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_11: attanā ca samādhisampanno hoti samādhisampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_12: attanā ca paññāsampanno hoti paññāsampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_13: attanā ca vimuttisampanno hoti vimuttisampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:7.6_14: attanā ca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī.
mn32:7.7_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
mn32:8.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
mn32:8.2_0: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso moggallāna, āyasmatā mahākassapena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
mn32:8.3_0: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ pucchāma:
mn32:8.5_0: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti?
mn32:8.6_5: dhammī ca nesaṁ kathā pavattinī hoti.
mn32:8.7_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
mn32:9.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
mn32:9.2_0: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso sāriputta, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
mn32:9.3_0: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ pucchāma:
mn32:9.5_0: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti?
mn32:9.6_0: “Idhāvuso moggallāna, bhikkhu cittaṁ vasaṁ vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati.
mn32:9.7_0: So yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ,
mn32:9.10_2: rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā nānārattānaṁ dussānaṁ dussakaraṇḍako pūro assa.
mn32:9.11_0: So yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayaṁ pārupituṁ,
mn32:9.14_0: Evameva kho, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhu cittaṁ vasaṁ vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati.
mn32:9.15_0: So yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ,
mn32:9.18_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
mn32:10.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto te āyasmante etadavoca:
mn32:10.2_0: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
mn32:10.3_0: Āyāmāvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamissāma; upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ bhagavato ārocessāma.
mn32:10.4_0: Yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṁ dhāressāmā”ti.
mn32:10.5_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te āyasmanto āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
mn32:10.6_0: Atha kho te āyasmanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn32:10.6_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn32:11.1_0: “idha, bhante, āyasmā ca revato āyasmā ca ānando yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁsu dhammassavanāya.
mn32:11.2_0: Addasaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, āyasmantañca revataṁ āyasmantañca ānandaṁ dūratova āgacchante.
mn32:11.5_0: Svāgataṁ āyasmato ānandassa bhagavato upaṭṭhākassa bhagavato santikāvacarassa.
mn32:11.7_0: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso ānanda, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti?
mn32:11.8_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā ānando maṁ etadavoca:
mn32:11.11_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
mn32:11.13_0: Yathā taṁ ānandova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
mn32:11.14_3: Ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthā sabyañjanā;
mn32:11.15_0: So catassannaṁ parisānaṁ dhammaṁ deseti parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi anuppabandhehi anusayasamugghātāyā”ti.
mn32:12.1_0: “Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, āyasmantaṁ revataṁ etadavocaṁ:
mn32:12.2_0: ‘byākataṁ kho, āvuso revata, āyasmatā ānandena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
mn32:12.3_0: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ revataṁ pucchāma—
mn32:12.5_0: Kathaṁrūpena, āvuso revata, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti?
mn32:12.6_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā revato maṁ etadavoca:
mn32:12.8_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
mn32:12.10_0: Yathā taṁ revatova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
mn32:13.1_0: “Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavocaṁ:
mn32:13.3_0: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso anuruddha, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti.
mn32:13.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā anuruddho maṁ etadavoca:
mn32:13.5_1: bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṁ lokānaṁ voloketi.
mn32:13.7_0: evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
mn32:13.8_0: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta, yathā taṁ anuruddhova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
mn32:13.9_2: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṁ lokānaṁ voloketī”ti.
mn32:14.1_0: “Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ etadavocaṁ:
mn32:14.2_0: ‘byākataṁ kho, āvuso kassapa, āyasmatā anuruddhena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
mn32:14.3_0: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ pucchāma …pe…
mn32:14.4_0: kathaṁrūpena kho, āvuso kassapa, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti?
mn32:14.5_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā mahākassapo maṁ etadavoca:
mn32:14.6_1: bhikkhu attanā ca āraññiko hoti āraññikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.6_14: attanā ca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī.
mn32:14.7_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
mn32:14.9_0: Yathā taṁ kassapova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
mn32:14.10_2: attanā ca āraññiko āraññikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_3: attanā ca piṇḍapātiko piṇḍapātikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_4: attanā ca paṁsukūliko paṁsukūlikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_5: attanā ca tecīvariko tecīvarikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_6: attanā ca appiccho appicchatāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_7: attanā ca santuṭṭho santuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_8: attanā ca pavivitto pavivekassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_9: attanā ca asaṁsaṭṭho asaṁsaggassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_10: attanā ca āraddhavīriyo vīriyārambhassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_11: attanā ca sīlasampanno sīlasampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_12: attanā ca samādhisampanno samādhisampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_13: attanā ca paññāsampanno paññāsampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_14: attanā ca vimuttisampanno vimuttisampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
mn32:14.10_15: attanā ca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī”ti.
mn32:15.1_0: “Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavocaṁ:
mn32:15.2_0: ‘byākataṁ kho, āvuso moggallāna, āyasmatā mahākassapena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
mn32:15.3_0: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ pucchāma …pe…
mn32:15.4_0: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti?
mn32:15.5_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā mahāmoggallāno maṁ etadavoca:
mn32:15.6_5: dhammī ca nesaṁ kathā pavattinī hoti.
mn32:15.7_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
mn32:15.8_0: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta, yathā taṁ moggallānova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
mn32:16.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn32:16.3_0: ‘byākataṁ kho, āvuso sāriputta, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
mn32:16.4_0: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ pucchāma—
mn32:16.6_0: Kathaṁrūpena, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti?
mn32:16.7_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā sāriputto maṁ etadavoca:
mn32:16.8_0: ‘idhāvuso moggallāna, bhikkhu cittaṁ vasaṁ vatteti no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati.
mn32:16.9_0: So yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ,
mn32:16.12_2: rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā nānārattānaṁ dussānaṁ dussakaraṇḍako pūro assa.
mn32:16.13_0: So yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayaṁ pārupituṁ,
mn32:16.16_0: Evameva kho, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhu cittaṁ vasaṁ vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati.
mn32:16.17_0: So yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ,
mn32:16.20_0: Evarūpena kho, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
mn32:16.22_0: Yathā taṁ sāriputtova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
mn32:16.23_0: Sāriputto hi, moggallāna, cittaṁ vasaṁ vatteti no ca sāriputto cittassa vasena vattati.
mn32:16.24_0: So yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ,
mn32:17.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn32:17.4_0: Api ca mamapi suṇātha yathārūpena bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyya.
mn32:17.5_2: bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā:
mn32:17.6_0: ‘na tāvāhaṁ imaṁ pallaṅkaṁ bhindissāmi yāva me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccissatī’ti.
mn32:17.7_0: Evarūpena kho, sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
mn32:17.9_0: Attamanā te āyasmanto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
